aom.scripting.ui.console

Class Campaign

  • Object
    • Campaign

  • public class Campaign
extends Object
    This class provides a collection of Console commands concerning Campaigns.
    Local Call
    Campaign commands are all local.
    Single Player Only
    Campaign commands are all intended for Single Player only.
    Author
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com
